name: DESANCTIFY: VHS Horror Movie
description:
DESANCTIFY: VHS Movie Horror Game

Desanctify is a VHS movie-themed atmospheric horror game about the disappearance of Lena Warren.

STORY:

Lena Warren, a 17-year-old girl who vanished without a trace in Soul Haven Cemetery in 1992. She attempted to record the well-known cemetery with her video camera even it has many supernatural tales.

When the case was reported to the police, they launched an investigation right away. They learned that Lena's teacher had assigned her students a project in which they were to create a documentary on whatever site they choose, but only Lena never came back.

With the help of Lorand, who claimed to be Lena's closest friend. They finally found her videocam lying in the cemetery grounds, but Lena is nowhere to be found.

Through her videocam, learn what happened to Lena and witness the horror she experienced.

FEATURES:

Time-Based Atmosphere: Due to the cemetery's intense haunting, this game has numerous jump scares and other terrifying elements, some of which are time-based. This implies that the more time you spend playing, the creepier it becomes.

Short Narrative Investigation: With ambiance and narrative exploration, uncover every nuance of the past and take on the perspective of the protagonist.

Film Effect: Simulates VHS effect to improve horror experience from the 80s and 90s.

Realistic Graphics & Game Mechanics: Stamina-based running and VCR filmed atmosphere.

CONTROLS:

W, S, D, A : Movement

E : Interact

F : Flashlight

Left Shift : Run

Ctrl : Crouch

View other control features in game options!
